Decklist.DesignGoal: Keep opponent low on land so that most of their spells become useless. Need to deal with Aether Vial and Goblin Lackey. Elves replaced Wild Growths to give more resistance to the Goblin Lackey

Card.Name: Noble Hierarch
Card.RulesText: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

Card.Name: Llanowar Elves
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {G}.

Card.Name: Young Wolf
Card.RulesText: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Card.Name: Birds of Paradise
Card.RulesText: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

Card.Name: Kitchen Finks
Card.RulesText: When Kitchen Finks enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

Card.Name: Eternal Witness
Card.RulesText: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Oracle of Mul Daya
Card.RulesText: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play lands from the top of your library.

Card.Name: Deus of Calamity
Card.RulesText: Trample Whenever Deus of Calamity deals 6 or more damage to an opponent, destroy target land that player controls.

Card.Name: Avenger Of Zendikar
Card.RulesText: When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token for each land you control. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

Card.Name: Pelakka Wurm
Card.RulesText: Trample When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

Card.Name: Nature's Claim
Card.RulesText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.

Card.Name: Naturalize
Card.RulesText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Card.Name: Thermokarst
Card.RulesText: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.

Card.Name: Winter's Grasp
Card.RulesText: Destroy target land.

Card.Name: Search for Tomorrow
Card.RulesText: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

Card.Name: Fallow Earth
Card.RulesText: Put target land on top of its owner's library.

Card.Name: Mwonvuli Acid-Moss
Card.RulesText: Destroy target land. Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Natural Order
Card.RulesText: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature. Search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Khalni Garden
Card.RulesText: Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped. When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token. {T}: Add {G}.

Card.Name: Rishadan Port
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Tap target land.

Card.Name: Maze of Ith
Card.RulesText: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
